english.segment1: You said you would have but you couldn't let go. You said you should have but you needed some more. I know you would have, if you could have it all. You said you would've, but you needed, you needed some more
english.segment2: You need a way, to leave yourself behind. To bury your name. To fade across the line
english.segment3: You said you should have but you wouldn't let go. You said you could have but you needed some more. I know you would have if you could have it all. You said you would've, but you needed, you needed some more
english.segment4: CHORUS: You need a way to leave yourself behind. To bury your name. To fade across the line. To breathe again. To fade across the line. I am the only way out. One step into the door. I am the only way out
english.segment5: . You said you could have but you wouldn't let go. You said you would have but you needed some more. I know you should have but you wanted it all. You said you could've but you needed, you needed some more
english.segment7: Last CHORUS: You need a way to leave yourself behind. To bury your name. To fade across the line. To breathe again. To fade across the line. I am the only way out. I am the door
